name: Asuji: The Legend of You
description:
After studying Biology for 7 minutes and designing a game around it, we are proud to present this masterpiece of a game: ASUJI: THE LEGEND OF YOU, a short sperm-like game made with love by Somnolent Team & Sproot Production.



Play as You the sperm, no one believe in You, everyone doubts You, You’s friends makes fun of him because his tail size is very below average. Prove them wrong in your training arc to increase your tail size and journey towards becoming a human baby!



Play time around 30 minutes.

Features:

  • Innovative sperm-type controls: wiggle your mouse to wag your tail and swim in the vaginal fluid!
  • Beautiful sperm-story told through kinda-VN gameplay!
  • Collectables SPERM CELLS, can you collect all the sperm cells?
  • Amazing hand drawn CG sperm-art!
  • Dodge the enemy CRAZY SPERM before they bite your head off!
  • 5 whole levels to swim through to train your sperm body and tail!
  • Sperm-based Steam achievements!
